mapper.sql: select id, month, site, principal, type, sales_revenue, compensation, final_freight, packaging_fee, promotion_fee, platform_refund, final_freight_return, selfdelivery_commission, fba_sales_commission, other_transaction_fee, storage_fee, shipping_label_fee, platform_service_fee, platform_refund_service_fee, platform_service_adjustment_fee, advertising_fee, service_provider_fee, gross_profit, asinking_num, yc_delivery_num, price, mixed_vat, other_fee, mixed_vat2, clear_broker_fee, final_freight_return2, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, isdelete from cpd_finance
mapper.insert:
insert into cpd_finance
month, site, principal, type, sales_revenue, compensation, final_freight, packaging_fee, promotion_fee, platform_refund, final_freight_return, selfdelivery_commission, fba_sales_commission, other_transaction_fee, storage_fee, shipping_label_fee, platform_service_fee, platform_refund_service_fee, platform_service_adjustment_fee, advertising_fee, service_provider_fee, gross_profit, asinking_num, yc_delivery_num, price, mixed_vat, other_fee, mixed_vat2, clear_broker_fee, final_freight_return2, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, isdelete,
#{month}, #{site}, #{principal}, #{type}, #{salesRevenue}, #{compensation}, #{finalFreight}, #{packagingFee}, #{promotionFee}, #{platformRefund}, #{finalFreightReturn}, #{selfdeliveryCommission}, #{fbaSalesCommission}, #{otherTransactionFee}, #{storageFee}, #{shippingLabelFee}, #{platformServiceFee}, #{platformRefundServiceFee}, #{platformServiceAdjustmentFee}, #{advertisingFee}, #{serviceProviderFee}, #{grossProfit}, #{asinkingNum}, #{ycDeliveryNum}, #{price}, #{mixedVat}, #{otherFee}, #{mixedVat2}, #{clearBrokerFee}, #{finalFreightReturn2}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isdelete},
mapper.delete:
delete from cpd_finance where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select cur.type, cur.profit as curMonthProfit, pre.profit as preMonthprofit , (cur.profit-pre.profit) as profitGross, (cur.profit-pre.profit)/pre.profit as profitGrowthRatio from (select type,`month`,SUM(gross_profit) as profit from cpd_finance where `month`=#{curMonth} GROUP BY type,`month`) cur LEFT JOIN (select type,`month`,SUM(gross_profit) as profit from cpd_finance where `month`=#{preMonth} GROUP BY type,`month`) pre on cur.type=pre.type order by curMonthProfit desc
